mcq.statement: The 8th BRICS Summit meeting was held in India on 15-16 October 2016, which countries comprise the BRICS group?

options.a: Brazil, Russia, India, China, South Africa
options.b: Brazil, Russia, Italy, China, South Africa
options.c: Belgium, Russia, India, China, South Africa
options.d: Brazil, Romania, India, China, South Africa
